# manageUsers(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Presents a view controller to manage users of the home.

## Declaration

```swift
func manageUsers(completionHandler completion: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func manageUsers() async throws
```

## Parameters

- **completion**: The block executed after the request is processed.



## Discussion

Only users that have administrator access to the home can call this method. Otherwise, the completion handler returns the error [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMError/Code/insufficientPrivileges].

## Managing users

- **currentUser**: The current HomeKit user.
- **HMUser**: A person in the home who may have access to control accessories and services in the home.
